data.title: Statement by the Austrian EU Presidency on the sentencing of six journalists of the newspaper “Zaman” in Turkey
data.meta_description: 1193rd Plenary Meeting of the Permanent Council
data.text: Address by the State Secretary and Special Representative of the Minister of Foreign and European Affairs of the Slovak Republic for the Slovak 2019 OSCE Chairmanship, Mr. Lukáš Parízek. Update by the Special Representative of the OSCE Chairperson-in-Office in Ukraine and in the Trilateral Contact Group, Ambassador Martin Sajdik. Report by the Chief Monitor of the OSCE Special Monitoring Mission to Ukraine. The Permanent Council adopted Decision No. 1303 on the theme, agenda and modalities for the 27th Economic and Environmental Forum. Concerns about the sentencing of six journalists of the newspaper “Zaman” in Turkey. Concerns about the sentencing of Mr. K. Mirsaidov in Tajikistan. Abduction of Mr. D. Askerov and Mr. S. Guliyev by Armenia in the occupied territories of Azerbaijan. High-level event “Climate, Peace and Security: The Time for Action”, held in Brussels on 22 June 2018. Twenty-seventh Annual Session of the OSCE Parliamentary Assembly, held in Berlin from 7 to 11 July 2018.
